name: LudumDare39: Dont ask me to stop being a outdated junkrobot: Saigo's legend the ultimate Battle
name_original: LudumDare39: Dont ask me to stop being a outdated junkrobot: Saigo's legend the ultimate Battle
description:
How To Play

WASD move,

 Left mouse button atack. 

Slow Motion: press Shift

SPECIAL: left mouse button during slow motion; (requires 1 bar) 

ULTIMATE:  right mouse button during slow motion (requires 3 bars)

Credits11
